description:
## Why
I'm annoyed at the lack of desktop app for voice, like hangouts had.

## What does it do
It just lets you keep voice open without a chrome browser. It will also check the dom for notifications and display a badge in the task bar and closing the app will send it to a tray instead of closing.

## Supported Operating Systems
Currently supports both OSX, Windows 10 and Linux.

Questions? Ideas? Join us in discord https://discord.gg/3SSS6vkKET

## Customize
You can change settings, apply themes and other things in the customization page. Go to `Electron > Settings` on Mac in the global menu bar, or `File > Settings` on windows. If you've hidden the menu bar you can also access the settings from the system tray.

**Windows Settings**

![Windows Settings](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/windowsSettings.png)

**Mac Settings**

![Mac Settings](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/macSettings.png?raw=true)

**System Tray Settings**

![System Tray Settings](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/systemTraySettings.png?raw=true)

## Themes
The latest version now supports custom themes, which can be set in the Settings dialog.

Not only themes but also a system for themeing! If you want to create your own theme and contribute back to the project you can do that [here](https://github.com/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app/blob/master/THEMES.md).

## Screenshots

**Main window:**

![Windows](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/windows.png?raw=true)

**Dracula theme:**

![Dracula](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/dracula.png?raw=true)

**Solar theme:**

![Solar](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/solar.png?raw=true)

**Minty theme:**

![Minty](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/minty.png?raw=true)

**Cerulean theme:**

![Cerulean](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jerrod-lankford/google-voice-desktop-app@master/screenshots/cerulean.png?raw=true)

## Attributions
- Dracula: https://github.com/dracula/dracula-theme
- Solar / Minty / Cerulean: https://bootswatch.com/
summary: An Electron shell wrapper around the Google Voice website
author: Jerrod Lankford
